data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mound, Laurence A., Tree, Desley J., Goldarazena, Arturo (2010): A new species of predatory Scolothrips (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) feeding on Raoiella mites (Tenuipalpidae) in Australia. Zootaxa 2620: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276036
